remarks:
Extend the definition of a wff to include one-to-one onto functions. (Read: ` F ` maps ` A ` one-to-one onto ` B ` .)  The notation ("1-1" above the arrow and "onto" below the arrow) is from Definition 6.15(6) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 27. 

---

This syntax is primitive. The first axiom using it is #P_df-f|NAV_LINK|HIDE_TVI.
